Posts.Content: My dad was diagnosed with grade 4 glioblastoma. Had the surgery last June, been struggling to get off of the decadron ever since. Currently he is at the Spaulding Rehab in Cambridge, but it has been a month now and he is still struggling to walk. I'm looking to find an alternative to decadron for him to try. Any help at all is appreciated and encouraged thanks
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?
